name: lbigelow
short_description: Lisa Bigelow is an advocate for sufferers that have been impacted by defective health-related items like the lately recalled Stryker Rejuvenate and DePuy ASR. Lisa functions hard to keep individuals updated on developments in the overall health elements of those devices along with keeping individuals informed regarding the legal elements involved with pending claims and lawsuits. When not speaking with individuals, Lisa enjoys backpacking, running, Japanese cooking and archery. Lisa is blessed to reside with her husband Mike and three young children: Abby, Jessica and Tyrone.
